# group-tab

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                                               | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `active`      | `active`      | Set this Group Tab as the active tab                                      | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `exclude`     | `exclude`     | The exact post names as appeared in MSL, separated by a pipe character \| | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `regex`       | `regex`       |                                                                           | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `replace`     | `replace`     |                                                                           | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `searchterms` | `searchterms` |                                                                           | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `tabtitle`    | `tabtitle`    | The title for the tab for this group                                      | `string`  | `undefined` |
